## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it addresses.

**Example:**
"I want to be able to say 'upgrade all my movies to 4K' instead of doing them one by one"

## Proposed Solution
How you think this feature should work.

**Example command:**
```bash
arrmate execute "upgrade all movies to 4K quality"
```

## Alternatives Considered
Alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
- Would this require new LLM capabilities?
- Would this need new API endpoints from Sonarr/Radarr?
- Any mockups, examples, or screenshots?

## Willingness to Contribute
- [ ] I'm willing to help implement this feature
- [ ] I can test this feature when it's ready
- [ ] I just want to suggest the idea
